routing_type: Client-side routing (React state-based, no server routes)

testing_requirements.note: This is a React SPA with client-side routing. All navigation is handled by React state, not server routes. Tests MUST use browser automation to interact with UI elements. HTTP requests to routes like /path-selection or /career-map will return 404 because these are not server routes.
testing_requirements.entry_point: / (root path only - all other routes are client-side)

features.name: Hero Selection
features.description: User selects their career path (Data Engineer, Data Scientist, or BI Analyst). This is the initial screen at root URL.

ui_elements.interaction: Click on career card to select

get.description: Initial screen displaying three career options. Use browser automation to interact with UI elements.

200.description: HTML page with React app. Must use browser automation to verify UI elements.

features.name: Path Selection
features.description: User chooses between Technical Mastery or Soft Skills & Leadership path. Appears after hero selection via React state change.

selectors.behavioral_path: text=Soft Skills & Leadership or [contains(text(), 'Behavioral')] or [contains(text(), 'Soft Skills')]

ui_elements.interaction: Click on path card to select
ui_elements.note: This screen is rendered by React state, not a server route. Cannot access via HTTP GET /path-selection

get.summary: Path Selection Screen - Same root URL, different React state
get.description: After selecting hero, React state changes to show path selection. Use browser automation to verify UI appears.

200.description: Same HTML page, but React renders Path Selection component. Must use browser automation.

features.name: Career Map
features.description: Displays unlocked levels in a winding path visualization. Rendered by React after path selection.

ui_elements.interaction: Click on unlocked level node to start game

get.summary: Career Map Screen - Same root URL, React state shows map
get.description: After path selection, React renders Career Map. Use browser automation to interact with level nodes.

200.description: HTML page with Career Map component rendered. Must use browser automation.
